contextId.occurrenceNote: "to generations 3 and 4." This refers to the grandchildren and great-grandchildren. Alternate translation: "even on the grandchildren and great-grandchildren  (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: to the third and the fourth generation

contextId.occurrenceNote: "on day seven." Here "seventh" is the ordinal number for "7." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
This is the second year after Yahweh brought his people out of Egypt. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
